title: Annoying Bug - Couldn't reconnect with game

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Wouldn't let me reconnect , this kept popping up.

replies.body:
Based on your screenshot, it looks like your connection to our game servers could be *poor or unstable*. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can make sure this isn't caused by a problematic local network configuration.

Let me know if this caused any change.
